Text.Text_Ko: 고마워. 나 혼자였으면 못 해냈을 거야.
Text.Text_En: Thank you. I couldn't have done it alone.

Item.Text_Ko: 슬슬 내 잃어버린 기억에 대해 듣고 싶은데...
Item.Text_En: I’m starting to want to hear about my lost memories...

Item.Text_Ko: 너는 왜 이 일을 시작하게 되었어?
Item.Text_En: Why did you start doing this work?

Text.Text_Ko: 좀 더 기다려줘. 내가 확신을 얻을 수 있을 때까지...
Text.Text_En: Just wait a little longer. Until I can gain the certainty...
I can trust you...
...No, never mind.

Text.Text_Ko: 오늘도 피곤할 테니, 빨리 쉬러 가.
Text.Text_En: You must be tired today too, so go rest quickly.

Item.Text_En: Are you avoiding the subject right now?

Text.Text_En: (Dr.K left without saying anything.)

Text.Text_Ko: (그때, 이전과 같은 이상한 목소리가 당신에게 들려온다.)
Text.Text_En: (At that moment, the same strange voice you heard before echoes in your head.)
@%^*@$!...... Hey, can you hear me?

Text.Text_Ko: 아, 드디어! 저번부터 계속 불렀는데, 이제서야 대답하는구만...
Text.Text_En: Ah, finally! I’ve been calling you since last time, and now you’re answering...
Anyway, you can call me Xeros.
I’ve been searching for you. Let’s go back now.

Item.Text_Ko: 무슨 이야기를 하는 건지 전혀 모르겠어.
Item.Text_En: I have no idea what you’re talking about.

Text.Text_En: What? What do you mean by that?
You don’t even remember who you are?

Item.Text_Ko: 네가 뭐라고 하는지 잘 들리지가 않아.

Text.Text_Ko: 대체 무슨 일이 있었던 거야? 기억나는 것 있어?
Text.Text_En: What the hell happened? Do you remember anything?

Item.Text_Ko: 내 사이드킥이 내가 비밀 히어로라고 말해줬어.
Item.Text_En: My sidekick told me I’m a Secret Hero.

Text.Text_Ko: 이건 또 뭐람... 어디서부터 설명해야 돼지?
Text.Text_En: What is this... where should I start explaining?

Text.Text_Ko: 어이, 너와 같이 다니던 그 사람 있잖아...
Text.Text_En: Hey, that person who was with you...
Don’t trust what they said.
You’re not a hero, you know...

Text.Text_Ko: (그 순간, 무언가 쿵하는 커다란 소리가 끼어들어, 그의 말을 끊는다.)
Text.Text_En: (At that moment, a loud crashing sound interrupts, cutting off their words.)
Damn it! I’ll contact you again later.

Text.Text_Ko: 참, 나와 연락했던 걸 들키진 말고.
Text.Text_En: By the way, don’t let anyone find out we were in contact.
